description: This Java class, NoteService, contains business logic for managing notes, including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes. It interacts with a NoteRepository for persistence and handles typical CRUD operations within a service layer in a Spring application.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Spring service class responsible for the core business logic surrounding Note objects, including CRUD operations and interactions with the data repository.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new Note object from the provided request data and persists it using the NoteRepository.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its ID, throwing NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: listNotes
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of Notes, with default pagination if parameters are null.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing Note's title and content based on provided data.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a Note specified by ID, throwing an exception if the note does not exist.
